Update Collaboration Space

<Heading

>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"spaceId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Id of the collaboration space to get"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The updates that need to be made to the space.","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"category":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AbstractCollaborationSpace"},{"type":"object","properties":{"collaborators":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Abstract Collaborator","properties":{"clientId":{"type":"string"}},"discriminator":{"propertyName":"role","mapping":{"CodeProvider":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"CodeProvider","description":"Someone who provides code","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"CodeProvider"},"algoSettings":{"type":"object","properties":{"test":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleCodeProvider"},"DataProvider":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataProvider","description":"Someone who provides Data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataProvider"}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataProvider"},"DataConsumer":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataConsumer","description":"Someone who consumes data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataConsumer"}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataConsumer"}}},"oneOf":[{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"CodeProvider","description":"Someone who provides code","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"CodeProvider"},"algoSettings":{"type":"object","properties":{"test":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleCodeProvider"},{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataProvider","description":"Someone who provides Data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataProvider"}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataProvider"},{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataConsumer","description":"Someone who consumes data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataConsumer"}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataConsumer"}],"title":"AbstractCollaborator"}}}}],"title":"CollaborationSpaceUpdate"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
